name: reduce_space_infiltration_by_percentage

arguments.name: space_type
arguments.display_name: Apply the Measure to a Specific Space Type or to the Entire Model

arguments.name: material_and_installation_cost
arguments.display_name: Increase in Material and Installation Costs for Building per Affected Floor Area

arguments.name: om_cost
arguments.display_name: O & M Costs for Construction per Affected Floor Area

modeler_description_xml: This can be run across a space type or the entire building. Costs will be associated with the building. If infiltration objects are removed at a later date, the costs will remain.
description_xml: This measure will reduce space infiltration rates by the requested percentage. A cost per square foot of building area can be added to the model.
